items.name: Sopa de tortilla
items.description: Onion and cilantro-based cream soup with poblano pepper strips and corn, traditionally served at celebrations in Puebla, Mexico.

items.name: Frijoles charros
items.description: Pinto beans cooked with bacon, sausage, tomato, cilantro and spices – a favorite of every Mexican family!

items.name: Sopa de pescado
items.description: Fish soup with tilapia and potatoes, prepared with onion, garlic and fresh tomatoes - a special dish originating from the coast of Veracruz.

items.name: Sopa de verdura
items.description: Our delicious home made vegetable soup.

items.name: Ensalada Palapa
items.description: Our own salad creation with cucumber, beets, onion, tomato, carrots, nopales (cactus), boiled egg and queso fresco.

items.name: Ensalada de la huerta
items.description: Garden salad mixed with fresh lettuce, onion, roasted peppers, tomatoes and carrots – light and refreshing!

items.name: Ensalada de Palmitos
items.description: Palm hearts, pinto beans, beets, cilantro, onion and tomato, as fresh as sitting underneath a palm three.

items.name: Ensalada de atún
items.description: Lettuce, onion, tomato and shredded carrots mixed with tuna fish. Your taste buds will tell you gracias!

items.name: Tamales
items.description: Warm, corn-based dough wrapped in a cornhusk and steam cooked — meat and vegetarian options available.

items.name: Mejillones Borrachos
items.description: Mussels sautéed with garlic, tomato, potatoes, cilantro and East End brewery beer or if you prefer in garlic sauce.

items.name: Salpicón de camarón y calamar
items.description: This famous dish from the Pacific coast includes boiled shrimp and squid mixed with fresh onion, cilantro, tomato, roasted peppers and boiled egg.

items.name: Chiles rellenos con queso y espinaca
items.description: A flavorful Mexico City classic – banana peppers stuffed with spinach and cheese and topped with green or red sauce.

items.name: Four Cheese Dip and chips
items.description: Delicious mix of cheddar jack, mozzarella, cotija and queso fresco served with our homemade tortilla chips.

items.name: Chips & salsa
items.description: Choose between pico de gallo or green salsa with tortilla chips.       (Both salsas for $5.50)

items.name: Guacamole & chips
items.description: The best guac in the ‘burgh! Served with our homemade tortilla chips.

items.name: Nachos with
items.description: Homemade tortilla chips topped with melted cheese, corn, sour cream, pico de gallo, cheese dip, and your choice of meat… Perfect for sharing with friends!

items.name: Empanada
items.description: Wheat flour dough filled with chicken, ground beef, shrimp or veggies… Provecho!

courses.course_description: All entrees are served with rice and pinto beans or vegetables.

items.name: Mole con Pollo (Chicken with Mole)
items.description: Chicken with traditional Mexican mole — the perfect blend of spices, chile peppers and chocolate! So good!

items.name: Lengua en salsa verde
items.description: Beef tongue slowly cooked in a poblano pepper and tomatillo sauce.

items.name: Barbacoa
items.description: This beef chuck is carefully marinated, then wrapped in banana leaves and steam-cooked. Provecho!

items.name: Flautas de pollo, barbacoa o papa
items.description: Your choice of chicken, barbacoa or potatoes wrapped in a crispy tortilla and topped with lettuce, tomato, queso fresco and sour cream. Dish includes 4 flautas.

items.name: Cazuela del mar
items.description: This seafood stew features salmon, tilapia and mussels cooked in white wine with tomato, garlic, and cilantro.

items.name: Chuletas de puerco en salsa verde ó al ajillo
items.description: Delicious pork chops prepared with our famous green salsa or garlic sauce.

items.name: Tilapia a la Veracruzana
items.description: Slow-cooked tilapia covered with a special sauce of tomato, onion, capers and green olives.

items.name: Fajitas Nayarit: Vegetarian or Chicken
items.description: Grilled fajitas mixed with peppers, mushrooms and pineapple... Yum!

items.name: Enchiladas verdes o rojas
items.description: Three enchiladas with your choice of chicken, beef, mushroom or cheese, wrapped in a corn tortilla and topped with green or red sauce, sour cream and queso fresco.  The combination will make your mouth water!

items.name: Enchiladas Norteñas
items.description: Three chicken, mushroom or cheese enchiladas with red sauce and 6 oz. steak on the side… An appetizing treatfor you!

items.name: Burrito Steelers
items.description: Ground beef and chicken, rice, pinto beans, spinach, pico de gallo, sour cream, cheese and spicy sauce wrapped in a flour tortilla. Every bite packed with flavor!

items.name: Charola para dos!
items.description: Can’t decide what you want? Try our sampler! Includes one tamal, one quesadilla, one flauta, one pork rib, chicken with mole and one empanada. Just the thing to share with a friend!

courses.course_description: The meat just falls off the bone! Served with rice and roasted potato, veggies or sweet potato french fries.

items.name: Porter House Steak
items.description: Locally raised 14oz Porter House cooked to order.

items.name: Pollo asado
items.description: Juicy 1/2 chicken marinated with wine and roasted.

items.name: Costilla de Puerco
items.description: Tender and juicy pork ribs seasoned with wine, roasted and topped with mole sauce.

items.name: Costilla de Res
items.description: Four short ribs seasoned with wine and grilled.

items.name: Chorizo Español
items.description: Grilled Spanish Chorizo.

items.name: Combo
items.description: Juicy Pork ribs with chicken leg and thigh.

items.name: Parrillada para dos
items.description: Four pork ribs, four short ribs, 4 oz. of grilled Spanish chorizo and chicken leg and thigh.

items.name: Quesadilla
items.description: Cheese or chicken and cheese quesadilla – Kids love them!

items.name: Grilled Cheese
items.description: Classic mozzarella and provolone grilled cheese sandwich!

items.name: Hamburger
items.description: Ground beef pattie with tomato and lettuce on a hamburger bun.

items.name: Flan de Coco
items.description: One of our specialties — this custard is made with your choice of coconut or vanilla.

items.name: Sopapilla
items.description: Crisp flour tortilla covered with sugar and cinnamon with vanilla, chocolate or strawberry ice cream.

items.name: Banana Palapa
items.description: Grilled banana with vanilla, chocolate or strawberry ice cream.
